GSP29vnyps00u:3_1: prabandharatnamidaṃ jayati jīvitamiva nyāyavistarasya vidyāsthānasya śrībhagavadrāmānujamunivarakṣuṇṇavartmano
GSP29vnyps00u:4: anupajīvya cedaṃ vidyāsthānaṃ ko vibhavaḥ sapanditumapi śeṣasya vidyāsthānajātasya ? /
GSP29vnyps00u:5: sarvameva hi loke śrutaṃ saṃśayaviparyayābhyāmāhitapāriplavaṃ vātyāspṛṣṭamiva tṛṇaśakalaṃ na kathañcidapi pratitiṣṭhati /
GSP29vnyps00u:6: pramāṇaparīkṣayā tu yathāvadupapāditayā dṛṣadeva vyapoḍhavikṣobhaṃ niṣkampamavatiṣṭhate /
GSP29vnyps00u:8: padavākyapramāṇabhedena hi tredhā vibhajanti śāstraṃ śāstravidaḥ /
GSP29vnyps00u:11: pramāṇaṃ tu---kvacidapyartheṣvanavagāḍhāvaṣṭambhāṃ svātmanyapyanupajātavisrambhāṃ ḍolāyamānāṃ buddhiṃ kareṇumiva tarkaśṛṅkhalābhirālānayanmananavyapadeśaṃ śāstram ;
GSP29vnyps00u:13: tadetat pramāṇapradhānamapi pramāṇagateḥ prameyasvarūpavivecanaparyavasānatayā prameyepi nyastapadaṃ pravṛttam /
GSP29vnyps00u:14_1: cānyathā ca prameyaṃ pratipadyamānairitastataḥ parikṛṣyamāṇāni pramāṇānyapi parāvṛttarūpatayā
GSP29vnyps00u:15: mānābhāsavyāmiśrāṇi hi mānāni na sukarāṇi vivektum /
GSP29vnyps00u:16: tadevaṃ śāstrameva paṅkilīkṛtaṃ cakṣuriva timiropasṛṣṭaṃ vigalitārthagrahaṇāpāṭava saṃvṛttam /
GSP29vnyps00u:18: ataḥ sarvopayogāya doṣaguṇahānopādānābhyāṃ śikṣaṇīyasyāsya nyāyavistarasya pṛthakprasthānaṃ nyāyadarśanaṃ nāma sūtrajātaṃ gautamena muninā prathamaṃ praṇītam ;
GSP29vnyps00u:19: yatra pramāṇāpramāṇādivivecanayā tattvanirṇayopāyāstatra ca saṃbhavanto guṇadoṣāḥ kathāsu ca grāhyāparihāryavibhāgāḥ saviśeṣaṃ pradarśitāḥ //
GSP29vnyps00u:20: tacca nyāyadarśanaṃ prathamaṃ pramāṇaprameyādisūtreṇa ṣoḍaśadhā padārthān vibhajya tatparīkṣaṇena caritārthama /
GSP29vnyps00u:21_1: manyamānena kaṇādena muninā kṛtsnameva prameyajātaṃ dravyādisaptapadārthaparisaṃkhyānenāsaṃkīrṇaṃ vibhaktam /
GSP29vnyps00u:22_0: tatra ca sāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyābhāvān vitathamevāpadārthān padārthayatā tathāvidhameva
GSP29vnyps00u:22_1: cānyadanyadālapatā grāhyamagṛhṇatā tyājyaṃ cātyajatā kaṇabhakṣeṇa dūramapathīkṛtaḥ
GSP29vnyps00u:22_2: śāstrapatha iti brahmasūtrakārādibhiḥ pratikṣipto vaiśeṣikaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP29vnyps00u:23_1: iti manyamānāḥ katipayasaṃskārasaṃskṛtamimaṃ pakṣaṃ parigṛhya nibandhān nibabandhuḥ
GSP29vnyps00u:24: te ca nibandhā eṣu divaseṣu nāmnaiva kevalamavaśiṣyantotadyathā--śrīmannāthamunimiśrapraṇītaṃ nyāyatattvam,
GSP29vnyps00u:26: śrībhagavadyāmunācāryāṇāmācāryaiḥ śrīmannāthamunicaraṇāśrayāṇāṃ śrīpuṇḍarīkākṣāṇāṃ śiṣyaiśca śrīrāmamiśragurubhirviracitaṃ vivaraṇaṃ ṣaḍarthasaṃkṣepaśceti granthadvayam,
GSP29vnyps00u:29_0: asyaiva ca nyāyapariśuddhipraṇeturācāryasyācāryeṇa mātulena ca vādihaṃsāmbuvāhaḥ
GSP29vnyps00u:29_2: nyāyakuliśābhidhānaṃ cetyete nibandhāḥ nyāyapariśuddhikṛtaivācāryeṇa tatra tatra
GSP29vnyps00u:30: yadeva yāvadeva cācāryeṇa kvacit kvacidudāhṛtaṃ vākyaṃ vākyakhaṇḍaṃ vā,
GSP29vnyps00u:33: atīte ca gaṇarātre kaiścidarvācīnairāvirbhūtairgranthakṛdbhirajñātapūrvavṛttāntairyathākathañcidvyākhyānena kaścidupakāraḥ kṛta iti //
GSP29vnyps00u:35_2: prācāmācāryāṇāṃ vāgvistarā etarhi śrotumapi durlabhatāṃ gamitārḥ /
GSP29vnyps00u:36: idṛśoyaṃ vidyāvadhaḥ kasya vā vidyāvyasanino na dūnoti mānasam ? /
GSP29vnyps00u:38: asyaivācāryasya vāṅmadhuniṣyando mudhaiva kiyān na visraṃsitaḥ /
GSP29vnyps00u:41_2: niyataśrāvyatayā rahasyasaṃjñitāni siddhāntaniṣkarṣaṇedaṃparāṇi lokaśreyase jātāni granthajātāni /
GSP29vnyps00u:42_0: tatra vedānte tāvat tattvaṭīkā nāma śrībhagavadrāmānujamunivaraviracitasya śārīrakamīmāṃsābhāṣyasya
GSP29vnyps00u:43: sā ca prathamasūtramātramapi yāvadasamagropalabdhapracārā vedāntavidyāvicārakāṅkṣiṇāṃ cintāvyasanāyaiva khaṇḍabhūtā paridṛśyate /
GSP29vnyps00u:44: vicitrāyodhanākuṇṭhaśaktau tejasvini svāṃ śakti samagramadarśayitvaiva niyatiyaiyātyenākasmāduparataṃ yodharatne taṭasthadṛṣṭe kasya vā vīradharmamanutiṣṭhato hṛdayaṃ na dūyeta /
GSP29vnyps00u:46: kecinmanyeran ācāryaireva na samāpūritāyaṃ grantha iti,
GSP29vnyps00u:47: tadetat svopamānena sarvatra śaktiparicchedaṃ kalayatāṃ pralapitamatra na kramate /
GSP29vnyps00u:48: trividhāḥ khalu loke prabandhakṛtaḥ---kecidgurukulacirapariśramairanekaśaḥ śrutān yathāśrutamarthān patreṣu viniveśya prakāśayanto lokamanugṛhṇanti /
GSP29vnyps00u:51_0: anye tu nirantarabhajanakṛtaprasadanena bhagavatā sarveśvareṇa dūrapratyūḍhapratyūhavipruṣo
GSP29vnyps00u:53_0: yeṣāmekapratibhāsūtrasyūtāni prameyaratnāni punaḥ punaḥ pariśīlitānyapi navanavānīva
GSP29vnyps00u:53_1: prajñāvatāṃ hṛdayeṣu kamapi camatkāramāvahanti na ca kadācit purāṇacitravad vicchāyāni bhavanti /
GSP29vnyps00u:54: nyāpariśuddhikṛdācāryastu dvitīyatṛtīyayorubhayorapri kakṣyayoḥ hārāvalyoriva nāyakamaṇiḥ prakāśata iti tattvavidāmaparokṣam /
GSP29vnyps00u:58: evaṅguṇena cācāryacūḍāmaṇipavanā śiṣyabuddhiṃ prasādayitumārabdhā kṛtirasamāpya madhye apaviddhā bhavatīti ko nukhalu prabhāvavedī pratipattumarhati ? /
GSP29vnyps00u:61: iti svakṛtasya bhāṣyapravacanasya aṣṭāviṃśyāmāvṛttau tattvaṭīkānibandhapraṇayanamācāryastattvaṭīkāprārambhe svayameva spaṣṭamāha /
GSP29vnyps00u:63: śreyaḥ śrīmān veṅkaṭanāthaḥ śrutipathyaṃ nāthaprītyai nāṭakamarthyaṃ vyadhitaitat” //
GSP29vnyps00u:64: iti sūtradhāravācā śārīrakabhāṣyapravacanaṃ saṃkalpasūryodayanirmāṇakāle triṃśadvārakṛtaṃ prathayati /
GSP29vnyps00u:66: tataḥ paścāt pravacanāvṛttayastatopi hi bhūyasyo bhavitumarhanti /
GSP29vnyps00u:69: śatadūṣaṇyāḥ samanantaraṃ tattvaṭīkā kṛteti ca pratīyate /
GSP29vnyps00u:70: uktaṃ hi svayamevācāryaistattvaṭīkāṃ prakramamāṇaiḥ--- “śātitaḥ śatadūṣaṇyāṃ śaṅkarādimudhāgrahaḥ /
GSP29vnyps00u:74: pravartitā ca pātreṣu tasmai śreṣṭhāya maṅgalam //
GSP29vnyps00u:80: naite śrutaprakāśikāyāmanyatra vā granthāntare pratipattuṃ sulabhāḥ /
GSP29vnyps00u:81: kiñca svācāryairvādihaṃsāmbuvāhāryaiḥ praṇīte vidyamāna eva hi nyāyakuliśākhye nyāyanibandharatne nyāyapariśuddhimācāryaḥ svayaṃ nibabandha /
GSP29vnyps00u:82: avaśyavaktavyeṣu cārtheṣu joṣaṃbhāvaḥ kathañcidapi śāsrācāryatāyāḥ sadṛśo na bhavati /
GSP29vnyps00u:85_1: mahāmatibhirapi sarvajñasakāśāt śuśrūṣitasya pratipādanārthamapūrvāyāḥ kṛteḥ samārambha iti /
GSP29vnyps00u:87: kiñca nijanibandhasya śrutaprakāśikārakṣaṇāṅgīkārasamaya eva labdhaprasaratāmanusmṛtya parakīyagranthapravacanamaṅgīkṛtamācāryairiti śakyamabhyūhitum /
GSP29vnyps00u:90: yathāhi nyāyasiddhāñjanamapi jaḍadravyaparicche denaiva paryavasitaṃ sāṃprataṃ paridṛśyate,
GSP29vnyps00u:93: itthamamumarthaṃ śrīraṅgarāmānujagurureva nyāyasiddhāñjanavyākhyāne “na kvāpyataḥ paramadṛsyata kośaśeṣa- staccheṣapūraṇakṛtiḥ parihāsahetuḥ /
GSP29vnyps00u:94: jñātavyamanyadapi tairniraṇāyi samya- ggranthāntareṣviti na kiñcidihāsti cintyam” //
GSP29vnyps00u:98: śeṣe tu mithyaiva kimapyaitihyaṃ kalpayitvā katipaye prajalpanti /
GSP29vnyps00u:99: yattāvat dvaitamatakhaṇḍanaparaḥ śeṣo granthaḥ madhvamatasthena kenacidyatinā bhikṣāmaṭatā savinayamupasṛtya prārthitoyamācāryaḥ taṃ tasya bhikṣārthe prāyacchiditi,
GSP29vnyps00u:106: śatadūṣaṇī ca śaṅkādikṛtasūtravyākhyānādinirāsārthameva pravṛtteti ca tadgranthamukha eva sphuṭībhavati /
GSP29vnyps00u:107: tatra hi ---- “prācīmupetya padavīṃ yatirājadṛṣṭāṃ tatsaṃnikṛṣṭamapi vā matamāśrayantaḥ /
GSP29vnyps00u:108: prājñā yathoditamidaṃ śukavat paṭhantaḥ pracchannabauddhavijaye parito yatadhvam” //
GSP29vnyps00u:110: atra 'tatsaṃnikṛṣṭamapi vā matamāśrayantaḥ' ityanena dvaitinaḥ svapakṣīkriyante /
GSP29vnyps00u:112: tathā ca---vidyāraṇyākṣobhyamunivivāde nirṇayaṃ bruvadbhirācāryeḥ “asinā tattvamasinā parajīvaprabhedinā /
GSP29vnyps00u:116: ' ityatra tu śaṅkarādītyādipadaṃ yādavabhāskarayoḥ saṃgrahāyeti sthitam /
GSP29vnyps00u:118_1: hi gauḍadeśīyaḥ paṇḍitacūḍāmaṇiḥ sarvāsu vidyāsu kalāsu ca saviśeṣakṛtaśramaḥ kaviśca
GSP29vnyps00u:118_2: brahmādvaitaṃ siddhantamātiṣṭhamāno vādakutūhalitayā sarvā diśaḥ paryaṭan jitakāśī
GSP29vnyps00u:119: tatra śrīraṅgaṃ divyakṣetraṃ viduṣāmāvāsamākarṇya devasevāpadeśena vādasamaramarthayamānaḥ śrīraṅgarājasya bhavagataḥ prāsādamāsadāda /
GSP29vnyps00u:120_0: tadānīṃ tatra bhāṣāmayīrgāthāḥ sarāgatālaṃ gīyamānā niśamya tatkartṝṇāṃ ca kavīnāṃ
GSP29vnyps00u:120_1: varṇāvarāṇāmapi pratimāstasmin devālaye devopacārairārādhyamānā viditvā tatra sevāsamavetān
GSP29vnyps00u:121: bhavatāmanenāpabhraṃśapāṭhena varṇāvarapūjanena ca dūrāpoḍhaṃ veṣṇavaṃ tejaḥ /
GSP29vnyps00u:123: anthathākṛtamakṛtaṃ hi bhavati' iti sākṣepaṃ papraccha /
GSP29vnyps00u:126: pratiṣṭhāprabhṛti sarva evālayasaṃskāraḥ kāryaḥ pratyagra eva iti ca niyamya taṃ divyālayaṃ gāḍhaghaṭitārgaladvāraṃ parityaktāśeṣapūjotsavaṃ ca kārayāmāsa /
GSP29vnyps00u:127_1: durante duḥkhasāgare nimagnāstaṃ ca prativādinaṃ sarvavidyāviśāradaṃ vādāhavanavaśūramaprakampyamākalayantaḥ
GSP29vnyps00u:127_2: sabhāmabhinavāṃ kāmapi saṃgamayya tasyānarthasya kiñcidapi pratividhānaṃ cintayāmāsuḥ /
GSP29vnyps00u:128: tasmin mahati sadasi viduṣāṃ saṃpradāyācāryaḥ śrīmān lokācāryaḥ sarveṣāṃ sabhāsadāmavadheyavacanaḥ samarthāmabhyarhitāṃ vācamādade--- “bhoḥ bhāgavatapradhānāḥ,
GSP29vnyps00u:129: balavantaṃ paripanthinaṃ parāṅmukhīkartumupāyaḥ kaścidatra me pratibhāti /
GSP29vnyps00u:131: asti kila kāñcyāṃ nagaryāṃ veṅkaṭanāthāryo nāma viduṣāṃ prathamaḥ /
GSP29vnyps00u:132: sa hi vṛṣaśailanāthasya ghaṇṭāṃśa evāvatīrṇaḥ iti tattvavidāṃ grahaṇam /
GSP29vnyps00u:133_0: soyaṃ pañcavarṣadeśīyaḥ śiśureva san nijamātulena vādihaṃsāmbuvāhenātreyarāmānujācāryeṇa
GSP29vnyps00u:133_1: śārīrakabhāṣyagrahaṇāya varadagurusakāśaṃ gacchatā priyabhāgineyena nītastatra bhāṣyaviṣaye
GSP29vnyps00u:133_2: prasaktān bahūn saṃdehaśṛṅkhalāgranthīn visraṃsayaṃstayā tatrasamavetayā prajñāvṛddhapariṣadā
GSP29vnyps00u:136: ' ityāśiṣaṃ prayuñjānena 'asya kumārasya svataḥ pratibhātasamastaśāstrārthasārasya vidyāsaṃskāramātraphalo gurūpadeśo bhaviṣyati /
GSP29vnyps00u:137: na tu jñāne kaścidapi śaktileśa ādheyo bhavati /
GSP29vnyps00u:138: bhagavānapi hi devakīnandanaḥ vidyāgrahaṇāya sāṃdīpinerācāryasya sakāśe gurukulavāsamagrahīt /
GSP29vnyps00u:139: kiṃ cāsya śaiśava evāyaṃ prajñāprakarṣo dāśaratheriva vikramatiśayo janmasiddhaḥ /
GSP29vnyps00u:141: sābhyasūyāḥ savismāyā vā dṛśo nāsmin bālavayasi patitumarhanti /
GSP29vnyps00u:142: dṛṣṭidoṣairhi viṣānalairiva prasaradbhistarava ivāvalāḍhāḥ kati nāma mahāguṇāḥ puruṣāḥ svaguṇairlokamanupakṛtyaivāstaṃ gatāḥ /
GSP29vnyps00u:144: śrībhagavadrāmānujasiddhāntasyaiṣa jayadhvajaḥ samucchrīyatām' iyādiśya śiśurasau nijamātule vādihaṃsāmbudācārye nyāsīkṛtaḥ //
GSP29vnyps00u:145: athāsau vayasā viṃśativarṣadeśīya eva san sarvatomukhaprasṛtaprabodhatayā pareṣāmanabhibhavanīyaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ /
GSP29vnyps00u:146_0: evamakṣayyapratibhādraviṇena sarveṣvapi ca tantreṣu nirāmayaṃ panthānamavagantuṃ
GSP29vnyps00u:146_1: prasādayituṃ cālaṅkarmīṇena cācāryeṇā sārdhaṃ kadācit kāñcīnagare devadevasya bhagavataḥ
GSP29vnyps00u:146_4: kṛtapraśastināmadheyo mādhavācāryo nāma vedabhāṣyakṛt vādāhave lagno niraṅkuśaniśitatarkaśarāsāravarṣiṇaḥ
GSP29vnyps00u:147: tena ca mādhavācāryeṇa svīye sarvadarśanasaṃgrahe rāmānujadarśanamupakṣipatā--- 'taduktaṃ veṅkaṭanāthena tattvamuktākakalāpe' ityupakramya, // śrīḥ //
